Turkey Run Photosynthesis Conference

Posted by PChem Purdue on May 10, 2023 · 1 min read

The 49th Midwest Southest Photosynthesis Conference at Turkey Run State Park is coming up! This is a great opportunity for scientists of all career stages to learn about what’s new in photosynthesis research, from spectroscopy to biology. This year’s conference is organized by Mike Reppert (Purdue Chemistry) and Sujith Puthiyaveetil (Purdue Biochemistry). For more information, check out the conference website.
